text:
@stonecold2050 Yes, this guy is a jerk. An idiot. A hypocrite. But replies that say “no sympathy” make me sad. Maybe you don’t agree. And that’s okay. But as with the death penalty, I wouldn’t wish covid-19 on anyone. 
(And maybe it’s not relevant, but I’m an atheist.)
